mapper.select: SELECT permissiondetail.id ,permissiondetail.target ,permissiondetail.func FROM permission, permissionuser, permissiondetail WHERE permission.id = permissionuser.permission_id AND permission.id = permissiondetail.permission_id AND permissionuser.user_id = #{userId} AND permissiondetail.target = #{target} AND permissiondetail.func = #{func} AND permissionuser.deleted = false AND permissiondetail.deleted = false AND permission.deleted = false

SELECT permissiondetail.id , permissiondetail.deleted , permissiondetail.created_at as createdAt , permissiondetail.modified_at as modifiedAt
, permissiondetail.permission_id as permissionId , permissiondetail.target , permissiondetail.func FROM permissiondetail WHERE permissiondetail.id = #{id}
SELECT count(permissiondetail.id) as listsize FROM permissiondetail

SELECT permissiondetail.id FROM permissiondetail
ORDER BY permissiondetail.id ORDER BY permissiondetail.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT permissiondetail.id FROM permissiondetail
AND #{mark} > permissiondetail.id ORDER BY permissiondetail.id DESC
AND permissiondetail.id > #{mark} ORDER BY permissiondetail.id ASC
AND #{mark} > CONCAT(permissiondetail.title, '_', permissiondetail.id) ORDER BY permissiondetail.title DESC
AND CONCAT(permissiondetail.title, '_', permissiondetail.id) > #{mark} ORDER BY permissiondetail.title ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
